    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Resourceful Ritualist](/Feats.aspx?ID=2043) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 187 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Ritualist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=72)

**Prerequisites**
[Ritualist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2041)

</column>

---

You can cast difficult [rituals](/Rules.aspx?ID=777) that might otherwise be just beyond your skill. You can attempt checks to cast a ritual that requires expert proficiency if you are trained, master proficiency if you are an expert, or legendary proficiency if you are a master.
name: Resourceful Ritualist
